author: Jacob Pramuk
description: Office of Management and Budget director Mick Mulvaney holds a briefing at the White House on Tuesday.
title: Watch: White House briefing with OMB director Mulvaney

author: Bob Bryan
description: "The spending on the border security is $2.6 billion, of which I think $1.6 billion is actual bricks-and-mortar construction," Mick Mulvaney said.
title: Trump's budget asks for $1.6 billion to build the wall along the US-Mexico border
